products.name: Premium Headphones
products.description: High-quality noise-cancelling headphones with 30-hour battery life and premium sound quality.

products.name: Ultra-Slim Laptop
products.description: 13-inch ultra-slim laptop with 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD, and all-day battery life. Perfect for professionals on the go.

products.name: Smart Fitness Watch
products.description: Fitness tracker with heart rate monitor, sleep tracking, GPS, and 7-day battery life. Water-resistant up to 50m.

products.name: Designer Leather Handbag
products.description: Genuine leather designer handbag with gold hardware and multiple compartments. Classic and timeless design.

products.name: Men's Classic Watch
products.description: Elegant stainless steel watch with sapphire crystal and automatic movement. Water-resistant up to 30m.

products.name: Organic Cotton T-shirt
products.description: Soft and breathable 100% organic cotton t-shirt. Sustainable and ethically produced.

products.name: High-Performance Blender
products.description: Powerful 1000W blender with multiple speed settings and presets for smoothies, soups, and more.

products.name: Air Purifier
products.description: HEPA air purifier suitable for large rooms, removes 99.97% of airborne particles and allergens.

products.name: Luxury Scented Candle Set
products.description: Set of 3 luxury scented candles made with soy wax and essential oils. Burns up to 40 hours each.

products.name: Professional Camera
products.description: 24MP mirrorless camera with 4K video recording capability, interchangeable lenses, and advanced autofocus.

products.name: Wireless Earbuds
products.description: Compact wireless earbuds with noise isolation, touch controls, and 5-hour battery life. Comes with charging case.

products.name: Running Shoes
products.description: Lightweight running shoes with responsive cushioning and breathable mesh upper. Ideal for daily runs.

products.name: Smart Home Speaker
products.description: Smart speaker with voice assistant, multi-room audio capability, and high-quality sound.

products.name: Cast Iron Dutch Oven
products.description: 5.5-quart enameled cast iron dutch oven, perfect for slow cooking, baking, and braising.

products.name: Yoga Mat
products.description: Non-slip yoga mat made from eco-friendly TPE material. 6mm thickness for joint protection.

products.name: Premium Coffee Maker
products.description: Programmable coffee maker with built-in grinder, thermal carafe, and customizable brew strength.

products.name: Minimalist Backpack
products.description: Water-resistant minimalist backpack with laptop compartment and hidden pockets. Perfect for commuters.

products.name: Smart Indoor Garden
products.description: Automated indoor garden with LED grow lights. Grow fresh herbs and vegetables year-round.

products.name: Luxury Bath Towel Set
products.description: Set of 6 premium cotton bath towels. Ultra-absorbent and quick-drying with hotel-quality softness.

products.name: Portable Bluetooth Speaker
products.description: Waterproof portable Bluetooth speaker with 20-hour battery life and built-in microphone for calls.
